channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report X-2024070661
item.description:
Report X-2024070661

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-12T15:12:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-28
  • City: MILWAUKEE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On June 28th a package with no indication of Dg marked on the outside was emitting a paint like odor. After opening the package a 1 gallon sized can was found inside of a bag and the can was marked as a class 3 and stated Resin on it. There was some spillage of liquid inside of the bag. The package was placed into a salvage drum and is being held pending further disposition.
